channel.title: Mikael Dubrovsky on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Mikael Dubrovsky on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Work In Progress
item.description: Scaling Bitcoin 2019 Tel Aviv “yesod” https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1172173183329476609 Optical proof of work Mikael Dubrovsky I am working on optical proof-of-work. I’ll try to pack a lot into the 10 minutes. I spent a year and a half at Techion. Physical scaling limits Probably the three big ones are, there’s first the demand for blockchain or wanting to use bitcoin more. I think more people want to use bitcoin. Most of the world does not have access to property rights.
